name: Space Heist (NeoStar Games)
description:
This is a endless game where you can play solo or compete against a friend in a threatening planetary environment.

Hop between planets in this adventure style planet hopping game to collect precious fuel for your way back home.

_______________________________________________________________

Controls:

Single Player:

Left arrow, Right arrow to revolve around a planet.

Up arrow : Hop/jump between planets

Down arrow : Collect fuel

_______________________________________________________________

2-player mode:

Player 1: W, A, S, D

Player 2: Arrow keys

_______________________________________________________________

This game was originally made in 10 days for Opera GX - "No Internet" game jam.

_______________________________________________________________

Credits:

Background Music: https://zapsplat.com
